turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Task 1: APPOINTMENT

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Hello, this week I want to practice calling a clinic to make a medical appointment. You are the receptionist. I'll be the patient. Please respond if this were a real conversation. Help me schedule a check-up appointment, ask questions about my symptoms, and refer time and give me options for available times and doctors. Ask follow-up questions if I seem confused.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I’d be happy to help! So, let’s start with your symptoms. Can you tell me what symptoms you’ve been experiencing and how long they’ve been going on? Then we can move on from there!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, I try to book in a doctor's appointment.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! We can definitely get that sorted out. Could you let me know which day and time would work best for you? That way, we can find a suitable slot with the doctor.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, I will go on Wednesday or Friday in the evening is good for me.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it! So, we’ll look for an evening slot on either Wednesday or Friday. Could you also let me know if you have a preference for a specific doctor, or if any available doctor would be fine?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, I want to have a live with doctor, please.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, that helps a lot! Now, just to confirm, could you share a bit more about the specific symptoms you’re experiencing? That way, we can make sure the doctor is fully prepared.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, for the change of the season, I feel tired, and I have a cough, and I have migraine, and I don't know if I have fever, but my temperature is really high.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: I see, that definitely gives us a good picture. Thanks for sharing all those details. Now, let’s find the best available time for you. Would you prefer an appointment on Wednesday evening or Friday evening? Let me know what works best!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Maybe Wednesday evening, please.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, Wednesday evening it is! I'll check the available slots for you with Dr. Kline. Is there anything else you'd like to mention or any other questions before we finalize the appointment?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Maybe how long is the current wait.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! Usually, appointments in the evening last about 30 to 45 minutes, depending on the complexity of your symptoms. That should give the doctor enough time to go over everything thoroughly. If you have any other concerns, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, is it okay if I come in 10 minutes early?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, that’s perfectly fine! We can definitely arrange it so that you come in about 10 minutes early. That way, you’ll have some time to check in and get settled. If there’s anything else you need, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, though I need to bring my Bupa insurance because I don't have Medicare.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it, no worries at all! We can definitely accommodate that. Just bring your insurance information when you come in, and we’ll take care of the rest. If you have any other questions or concerns, I’m here to help!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, I need a medical certificate for work.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, that's no problem at all. You can bring your medication list along, and we’ll make sure the doctor has all the information needed. If there’s anything else you think of, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Maybe not, since I'll see you at, you remember the time, the clock to my appointment, please? It's on Wednesday, but I don't remember the time.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! I’ll double-check the exact time for your Wednesday evening appointment and confirm it for you. I’ll send you all the details, and if you have any other questions, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, thank you, that really helped.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You’re very welcome! I’m glad I could help. If you need anything else at all, just let me know. Looking forward to seeing you on Wednesday, and take care!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I appreciate your time, bye for now.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No worries at all! I'll make sure everything is confirmed, and if anything changes, just let me know. Have a great day, and I’ll be here if you need anything else! Task 2: VISITING A BANK

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Hi, hello, I want to practice to visiting a local bank branch or calling customer service to request help with everyday banking service, I may need to open a new account, I would not update my details or ask about specific features such as only in banking or international transfer, because my bank in Colombia built my car, and if you can't to be a person that answer my call to the bank, yes, I play the role of customer, please create a realistic and authentic bank situation and responding and ask if this were our conversation. Okay, we can start.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I can help with that! We can definitely start by talking about the kind of services you’re looking for, and then we can go through the steps of booking an appointment, as well as how to get the right information from your insurance. Let’s go step-by-step, and if you have any specific questions along the way, I’m here to help!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “okay i opening a new one account okay okay hi i like to open a new save an account”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure, I'd be happy to help with that! Let's start with a few details. Is this account for personal or business use? And then we can go from there!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Iso personal account, please.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, got it! So, to get started, I'll just need a few details like your full name, your contact information, and maybe some identification details. Once we have that, we can move on to setting up everything for you. Sound good?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, my name is Julieth Angarita, my birthday is 7th of April of 1996, and my address is Naivara Street, Paradise.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Julieth! That definitely helps us get started. Next, we can move on to verifying your identity and then selecting the account type and any additional preferences. If you have any questions along the way, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, um...”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: All right, perfect!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “What types of accounts are available for students?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, we can definitely do that. I’ll make sure we go through all the options and find the best fit for you. And if you have any other questions or need more details at any point, just let me know, and I’m here to help!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “which documents I need to bring.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You’ll typically need a valid photo ID, like a driver’s license or passport, and any proof of address, such as a utility bill or bank statement. If you have any specific documents related to your previous accounts, that can also be helpful. But we’ll guide you through it step by step!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, can I open an account without job?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, you can! We can definitely start the process and get everything set up without needing an initial deposit. Once your account is fully established, we can always add funds later on. Let me know if you have any other questions!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, my last phone number is not good. I need to update my phone number and”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it, that makes

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yeah, no, it's okay.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No worries at all! Whenever you’re ready, we can update that information and make sure everything is accurate. Just let me know if you need any assistance along the way!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, my new number is 0480722457.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, thanks for sharing that! I’ll make sure we update your contact details accordingly. If there’s anything else you need or any other information you’d like to add, just let me know, and I’m here to help!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, maybe do you offer debit cards with this account?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, we can definitely go over that. I’ll make sure we review all the fees and charges associated with the account so you know exactly what to expect. If you have any specific questions about the costs, just let me know, and we’ll cover everything thoroughly!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Transcript Unavailable

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great question! Typically, the debit card comes with no initial fee, and there might be some small transaction fees depending on usage. We’ll go over all the details so you have a clear picture. And of course, if you have any other questions, I’m here to help!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yeah, I said that my bank blocked my credit card in Colombia. I don't know if you could help me and I don't know what is the process for telling Colombia that my card is blocked.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: I understand, and I’m happy to help with that. We can definitely look into the issue with your card and see what might be causing the block. If you can share any details or any error messages you received, we can try to figure out the best steps to resolve it. Just let me know what you need!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, I received a message, but I don't understand.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No worries at all; I’m here to help you every step of the way. We can definitely go through the details together and figure it out. Just let me know any specific concerns you have, and we’ll work through them one by one!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, but I prefer to face-to-face because I don't like to speak here for fun about my details, my bank details.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: I completely understand, and your privacy is definitely important. We can handle everything securely and discreetly. If you prefer, we can also go over things in smaller steps or even through a more private channel. Just let me know what you’re comfortable with, and we’ll make sure everything goes smoothly.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Now it's okay, I'll follow the instructions and maybe... I don't know when I call to go to the bank.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: That’s totally fine! Whenever you’re ready, you can just reach out, and we can schedule the best time for you. In the meantime, if you have any questions or need any assistance, I’m always here to help. Just let me know whenever it’s convenient for you!

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: That’s a great question! Usually, we can start by gathering a bit of basic information and then choose a convenient time that works best for you. From there, we can go over any specific needs or preferences you have. And of course, I’m here to help with any questions that pop up along the way!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, now eat that Anguirus, that Anguirus costumes have a great day.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Thank you so much! I really appreciate that, and I’m always here if you need anything in the future. Have a wonderful day, and take care!
